- "Implemented login screen UI with Flutter and BLoC"  
- "Fixed state issue when returning from ProfilePage"  
- "Refactored API service using Dio and centralized error handling"

## Type of Change
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)  
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)  
- [ ] Breaking change (existing functionality no longer works as expected)  
- [ ] Refactor (code improvement without changing behavior)  
- [ ] UI/UX update (layout, theme, Material 3 widgets, animations, etc.)  
- [ ] Documentation update (README, guides, comments, etc.)  
- [ ] Other (please describe):  

## Checklist
- [ ] My branch is up to date with `origin/develop`  
- [ ] The project builds and runs successfully (`flutter pub get`, `flutter analyze`, `flutter run`)  
- [ ] All unit and widget tests pass locally (`flutter test`)  
- [ ] All integration tests pass locally if applicable (`flutter test integration_test`)  
- [ ] Commit messages follow the **Conventional Commits** standard  
- [ ] UI changes have been manually tested on at least one emulator/device  
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, tokens, credentials) are committed  
- [ ] At least one teammate has reviewed this PR
